meanings.definition: Simple past tense and past participle of love.
meanings.sent1: She luved spending time with her family.
meanings.sent3: The puppy luved chasing its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The artist luved painting the world with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: He luved the taste of freshly baked cookies.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment or affection.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always called me her little luved.
meanings.sent2: The teddy bear became her favorite luved.
meanings.sent3: The old cat was the family's luved and pampered pet.
meanings.sent4: The worn-out blanket was her childhood luved.
meanings.sent5: The photo album held memories of her luved ones.
